name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
With a robust background in technical education and continuous learning, I possess 8 years of experience as a Full Stack Developer, bringing a unique blend of skills tailored for the Field Service Engineer role in Medical Imaging. My strong system analysis abilities enable me to perform effective system performance monitoring and troubleshooting in both electronics and mechanics, ensuring optimal functionality of medical imaging equipment.

I have successfully led multiple projects requiring high-performance solutions, leveraging modern technologies such as **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Python**, and **Flutter**. My proficiency in cloud services, including **Azure** and **AWS**, further supports my capabilities in preventative maintenance and system diagnostics.

Additionally, my good communication skills allow me to clearly convey technical information to diverse stakeholders, ensuring seamless collaboration. I am also fluent in English and proficient in a Scandinavian language, enhancing my ability to operate in multi-lingual environments.
